## GroupedPriorityList class

The `GroupedPriorityList` contains a \[\[PriorityListGroupMap\]\] to manage a larger number of items in priority groups.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class GroupedPriorityList<T extends PriorityListElement> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [groups](./harp-utils.groupedprioritylist.groups.md) |  | [PriorityListGroupMap](./harp-utils.prioritylistgroupmap.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; |  |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [add(element)](./harp-utils.groupedprioritylist.add.md) |  | Add an element to the <code>GroupedPriorityList</code>. Selects group based on the elements priority. |
|  [clear()](./harp-utils.groupedprioritylist.clear.md) |  | Remove all internal \[\[PriorityListGroup\]\]s. |
|  [clone()](./harp-utils.groupedprioritylist.clone.md) |  |  |
|  [count()](./harp-utils.groupedprioritylist.count.md) |  | Count the number of elements in this <code>GroupedPriorityList</code>. |
|  [forEach(fun)](./harp-utils.groupedprioritylist.foreach.md) |  | Apply function to all elements in this <code>GroupedPriorityList</code>. |
|  [merge(other)](./harp-utils.groupedprioritylist.merge.md) |  | Merge another \[\[GroupedPriorityList\]\] into this one. |
|  [remove(element)](./harp-utils.groupedprioritylist.remove.md) |  | Remove an element from the <code>GroupedPriorityList</code>.<!-- -->Note: It is required that the priority is the same as it was when the element has been added. Otherwise, the removal will fail. |
